Package playwriter

Class ArgumentPair

java.lang.Object
playwriter.ArgumentPair
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pair
public final class ArgumentPair extends Object implements Pair
Represents a pair of arguments.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Almerge

  • Constructor Summary

    ArgumentPair(String argument)
    Constructor with only one String argument (second is null).
    ArgumentPair(String argument, int index)
    Constructor with one String argument and the index at which to split it.
